subject: Sexual Health
title: Menopause and Sexual Health
description: A fast breakdown of Menopause and Sexual Health for builders.

hook.text: Menopause changes sexual health dramatically, yet many women receive no guidance on what to expect or do about it.

buildup.text: Declining estrogen causes vaginal dryness, reduced blood flow, and thinning tissue that can make sex painful.

discovery.text: About 45% of postmenopausal women experience painful intercourse, but effective treatments exist.

twist.text: Many women report better sex after menopause. Freedom from pregnancy fears and empty nests boost desire.

climax.text: Menopause is a transition, not an ending. With proper care, sexual health can thrive through and beyond it.

punchline.text: Menopause changes the rules. It does not end the game.
